foreignData.name: Crosis' Katakomben
foreignData.text:
Crosis' Katakomben sind zusätzlich zu ihrem Landtyp noch ein Hort.
Opfere Crosis' Katakomben, wenn sie ins Spiel kommen, wenn Du nicht ein Land, das Du kontrollierst und das kein Hort ist, auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurückbringst.
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um {U}, {B} oder {R}.

foreignData.name: Catacombes de Crosis
foreignData.text:
Ces Catacombes de Crosis sont un repaire en plus de leur type de terrain.
Quand ces Catacombes de Crosis arrivent en jeu, sacrifiez-les à moins que vous ne renvoyiez un terrain non-repaire que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.
{T}: Ajoutez {U}, {B}, ou {R} à votre réserve.

foreignData.name: クローシスの地下墓地

name: Crosis's Catacombs
originalText:
Crosis's Catacombs is a Lair in addition to its land type.
When Crosis's Catacombs comes into play, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
oc
T: Add o
U, o
B, or o
R to your mana pool.

rulings.text: You can return a land that is tapped or untapped.

If you don’t want to unsummon a land, you can play this card then tap it for mana before the enters the battlefield ability resolves. You may then choose to sacrifice it instead of unsummoning a land.
This land is of type “Lair” only; other subtypes have been removed. It is not a basic land.

text:
When Crosis's Catacombs enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.
